meanings.definition: A digital icon or symbol used to convey emotions or facial expressions in written communication.
meanings.sent1: I sent an emoticon to show I was happy.
meanings.sent2: She always adds an emoticon to her messages to express her feelings.
meanings.sent3: The emoticon winked back at me from the screen.
meanings.sent4: The emoticon on the screen seemed to be laughing at my joke.
meanings.sent5: The emoticon with the big smile made the message more cheerful.

meanings.definition: A combination of keyboard characters used to represent a facial expression, such as :-) for a smile.
meanings.sent1: He typed an emoticon to show he was joking.
meanings.sent2: The email included a cute emoticon at the end.
meanings.sent3: The emoticon on the screen seemed to be winking at me.
meanings.sent4: Her text message was full of emoticons expressing different emotions.
meanings.sent5: The emoticon with the heart eyes made the message more affectionate.
